.. _platform-support-key:

Key
---

+-----+-------------------------------------+
| |f| | Supported and tested in CI          |
+-----+-------------------------------------+
| |y| | Supported and tested by maintainers |
+-----+-------------------------------------+
| |v| | Supported but not tested regularly  |
+-----+-------------------------------------+
